snippet.title: The Little Eggy That Could Marble Madness Style Game Video
snippet.description:
This challenging game was developed in 2006 for an Easter-themed game competition.  The game inspired by classic Marble Madness and the Playstation game Jumping Flash.

Original PC game: http://www.m3dr.com/projects/tletc/index.html

The objective is to collect all of the candy on each level and reach the end without falling too far or you'll crack.  Also, watch out for other hazards or you're done for.

It features original graphics, models, sounds and music including 25 increasingly difficult levels spread across five vivid worlds, many different candies to collect, tons of options, a hi-score and unlock feature, and much more.

Challenging, but fun!
